_comment: Maps TypeScript submodule SHA to npm package version. Uses dev nightly builds (6.0.0-dev.YYYYMMDD) that match specific commits.
_usage: When you update the TypeScript submodule, find the commit date and use the corresponding nightly: npm view typescript@6.0.0-dev.YYYYMMDD

7f6a84673def7665a4c4bc2bdfaf7bcc8549b276.note: Commit from TypeScript main branch, nightly build from same date

default.note: Fallback to latest stable when submodule SHA is not mapped
